posts.description:
.
These strangely odd folk, 
All looking for ghosts..
Bizarrely odd readings, 
But what freaked him out most, 
Was the cold hand that rubbed his shoulder, 
Almost certainly from behind, 
While his friends there in front of him, 
Made his head rewind...
There was movement from a lamp, 
Over hundreds years old, 
And stories of ghostly tramps, 
Which never should be told.
He thinks he loved it all, 
Except for that part, 
Where he fell through a wall, 
And had to hold in a fart.
.
There was activity all around, 
Which made his heart go thump, 
And time in that bear chained room 
which made all three men jump...
He'd highly recommend 
A night with these fine hosts.
These strangely odd folk, 
All looking for ghosts. 
@ghostventures.
Eric grew up being abnormally terrified of the paranormal, 
and blames cold mornings watching Scooby Doo. 
So when he got to visit #warwickcastle for a #ghosthunt one night 
He literally jumped at the opportunity. 
Please join them sometime on their tours, we had a really great time.. Next one is here : 
The Spirit House is a 500 year old building built on the site of the Battle of Evesham.  Many people have met the Doctor who lived here in the mid 1800's and many have felt the presence of 'Colin', who moves items and touched visitors. 
I have a friend named Colin. 
He sounds very similar üòÇ

#ghosthunt #ghost #warwickcastle @warwickcastleofficial @starwars #stormtrooper #haveyouseeneric #london #uktours  thanks to @paul_w_hands_photography  for inviting us, we hope to come on many more üëçüèª @canonuk #canon5dmarkiii #toyphotography #warwick #warwickshire #ghostventures

This is the Easter image we made for @fentimansltd :) we can finally share. We made a mould of their iconic bottle and turned it into chocolate. massive amount of fun doing it and great #chocolate too :) ..... please heck out our food photography @grumpycockstudios #easter2017 #fentimans #foodporn #foodphotography #lemonade #gcfoodporn #gcfood #gcfoodphotography #advertising #canon5dmarkiii @canonuk

.
You drown not by falling into a river, but by staying submerged in it. Paulo Coelho.
.
Billie went looking for Eric. Somewhere out on the Isle of Skye. He follows Eric everywhere. Sometimes he isn't sure why :).
.
#neverstopexploring #isleofskye #kayak #adventure #stormtrooper #haveyouseeneric @toyphotoawards #toyphotography

.
Don't ever let anyone put out your light because they are blinded by it.
.
Eric wandered all over  Neist point lighthouse on the western most tip of the Isle of Skye.
The light. Incredible. The landscape. Beautiful. The wind.... unbearable :) .
#neverstopexploring #neistpoint #scotland #isleofskye @visitscotland @natgeotravel #haveyouseeneric #explore #lighthouse

Huge amounts of fun today at the #ukphotoshow. Talk went well I thought :) nerves were calm :) Thank you so much to all who came and supported so good to put a few names to the faces that have been following Eric! And to Ginny and new friends from the @501st_ukgarrison ! We look forward to joining the family!!!! Eric was pleased to meet you all! And thank you to Jen from @sigmauk for always being so incredible. Also to my pal and partner @craigmorran for the support (and the pictures!) . Couldn't have got through it without you and your lovely wife Sam! So much love for you guys. And as always my good pal @karlholtbyfoto and Helen. You did good man.! Who knows what next year brings huh. ;) I'll be back at it at 2pm tomorrow @thephotographyshow again so please come down and get a free print üòç @mcmcomiccon #stormtrooper #haveyouseeneric

Actually. !!! It's today. :) I'll be talking on the social stage at 3pm. If you're there please come get a free Eric print. :) if I haven't collapsed from anxiety that is :) #ukphotoshow #haveyouseeneric @thephotographyshow #anxiety #imnotapublicspeaker #neverstopexploring

.
"This melancholy London - I sometimes imagine that the souls of the lost are compelled to walk through its streets perpetually. One feels them passing like a whiff of air.."
William Butler Yeats.
.

Please join Eric at the @thephotographyshow #ukphotoshow on Saturday and Sunday for an anxiety attack ;) .

.

Please come see me mumble through what might turn out to be 'the adventures of Eric' üòÑ.
Hope to see you all there. .
